thread.title: AB InBev-SABMiller Deal Becomes a Family Affair
thread.title_full: AB InBev-SABMiller Deal Becomes a Family Affair - WSJ

author: Paul J. Davies
title: AB InBev-SABMiller Deal Becomes a Family Affair
text:
Colombia’s Santo Domingo family passed on the last offer from AB InBev. Now, every other SABMiller investor must wait to see if an extra $410 million cash will tempt them.
Budweiser owner AB InBev has increased its proposal for a takeover of its London-listed rival. Most shareholders are now being offered 32 times SABMiller’s forecast earnings for this year in cash. SABMiller’s two biggest investors, which includes the Domingo... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
